title: Smart WiFi Fish Feeder
description: A DIY automated fish feeder controlled via WiFi using an ESP32 and Telegram integration.

title: ESP32 WiFi New Year Countdown Timer
description: Build a synchronized countdown timer using ESP32 that fetches precise time from the internet.

description: Building your first real circuits and understanding breadboards and basic components.

description: Exploring sensors, serial communication, and more advanced interaction techniques.
